Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "The Majestic" (1972) starring James Whitmore and Elizabeth Taylor.

The story revolves around a washed-up movie producer who pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood. 

However, his luck changes when he meets Sabeth, a young woman from a small town in France. 

Fate?  It's up to you to find out.
